name: Slimenia: Retribution
description:
The Slime Kingdom has been overthrown in a coup d'etat. With every slime in the land turned against you, you must squish and slide your way to the new king, and give him a taste of his own medicine!

This game is a proof-of-concept finished in Spring of 2013, written in Visual Studio, utilizing C# with Microsoft XNA packages. The entire game was written in a single class file without the creation of any new objects. If you want to see the source code, send me a message.
